question: Who has been selected for the FIAF Award for his contribution to the world's film heritage?
explanation:
Indian Actor Amitabh Bachchan will be conferred with the prestigious FIAF (International Federation of Film Archives) Award for his contribution in the field to preserve the worldâ€™s film heritage. He would be the first Indian film personality to receive this honor.
The International Federation of Film Archives was founded in Paris in 1938. It is headquartered at Brussels, Belgium.
